alert.note: Alert for Dawes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 2:57AM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dawes County through 245 AM MDT... At 157 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Ardmore, or 25 miles northwest of Chadron, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chadron Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
